name: Layout.Flex

types.name: Basis
types.comment: Specifies the size of an item before remaining space is distributed.

types.name: Wrap
types.comment: Specifies the wrapping of the items in a container.

values.name: alignContent
values.comment: Specifies the alignment of the lines of items in a container along the cross axis.

values.name: alignItems
values.comment: Specifies the alignment of the items in a container along the cross axis.

values.name: alignSelf
values.comment: Specifies the alignment of an item in a container along the cross axis.

values.name: basis
values.comment: Specifies the proportion of total space an item in a container should initially occupy.

values.name: column
values.comment: Returns a `div` node which is styled as a flexible box with a column layout.
values.type: List Layout.Common.Rule -> List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: columnReverse
values.comment: Returns a `div` node which is styled as a flexible box with a reverse column layout.
values.type: List Layout.Common.Rule -> List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: flex
values.comment: Shorthand for the combination of `grow`, `shrink`, and `basis`.

values.name: grow
values.comment: Specifies the proportion of available space an item in a container should grow into.

values.name: justifyContent
values.comment: Specifies the alignment of the items in a container along the main axis.

values.name: order
values.comment: Specifies the relative order an item in a container should appear in.

values.name: row
values.comment: Returns a `div` node which is styled as a flexible box with a row layout.
values.type: List Layout.Common.Rule -> List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: rowReverse
values.comment: Returns a `div` node which is styled as a flexible box with a reverse row layout.
values.type: List Layout.Common.Rule -> List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: shrink
values.comment: Specifies the proportion of missing space an item in a container should shrink into.

values.name: wrap
values.comment: Specifies the wrapping of the items in a container.

name: Layout.Grid

values.name: alignContent
values.comment: Specifies the alignment of content in a container along the row axis.

values.name: alignItems
values.comment: Specifies the alignment of content in items along the column axis.

values.name: alignSelf
values.comment: Specifies the alignment of content in an item in a container along the column axis.

values.name: cell
values.comment: Returns a `div` node which is styled as a cell in a grid.
values.type: String -> List Layout.Common.Rule -> List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: gap
values.comment: Shorthand for the combination of `gapRow` and `gapColumn`.

values.name: gapColumn
values.comment: Specifies the size of the gaps between columns.

values.name: gapRow
values.comment: Specifies the size of the gaps between rows.

values.name: grid
values.comment: Returns a `div` node which is styled as grid.
values.type: List String -> List String -> List (List String) -> List Layout.Common.Rule -> List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: justifyContent
values.comment: Specifies the alignment of content in a container along the row axis.

values.name: justifyItems
values.comment: Specifies the alignment of content in items along the row axis.

values.name: justifySelf
values.comment: Specifies the alignment of content in an item in a container along the column axis.

name: Layout.Common

types.name: Align
types.comment: Specifies the alignment of a container or item.
